To establish new local passenger transportation services in the urban area as and when required and to change, reduce or abolish any services if the commission considers that desirable. 3. If the commission considers it desirable, to establish, construct, manage and operate parking lots for the parking of vehicles in connection with its local passenger transportation system, and to charge fees for parking there. 4. To make requisitions on the city for the money necessary to carry out its powers and duties.
